STScI.edu (NASA archive) | Full stack web developer | FULL-TIME | Baltimore, MD | ONSITE

MAST (Mikulski Archives for Space Telescopes) is a multi-petabyte astronomical data archive that maintains the mission data for Hubble, Kepler, GALEX, Transiting Exoplanet Survey Satellite (TESS), and James Webb Space Telescope (JWST).

We're looking for a full-stack web developer to help us build web applications and services for the communities we support. Our applications include rich search interfaces, web-based visualization tools, and data APIs. You will be part of an interdisciplinary team of astronomers, developers, testers, archivists and analyst, recognized as providing first-class support for its users and science teams. Your job will be to design and implement services that support the data archive of today and help shape future innovations that will allow MAST to continue to be the premier archive for data-driven astronomy in the 21st century for missions such as WFIRST.

Must be a US citizen or permanent resident (green card).
